body:
## Expected Behavior

`workflow_task_execution_failed` metric should always have `failure_reason` tag

## Actual Behavior

`workflow_task_execution_failed` metric sometimes doesn't have `failure_reason` tag

comments.body: What is the situation where this exception happens in that PR? Am just curious because I can't see where it reports a task failure in that catch clause.

title: workflow_task_execution_failed metric sometime doesn't have `failure_reason` tag
